page.title: 07Shirehill Hospital Glossop
page.content: {Shirehill Hospital}was opened in the 1800's as a{workhouse.}It is now a long stay hospital for the elderly. It does not have a casualty department. There are{8}large rooms and a few rooms where equipment is stored.{ {Four}of the rooms are bedrooms and{ {four}are day rooms. The women's rooms are on the bottom floor and the men's rooms are upstairs. There are{60}beds in the hospital and all are filled. All the rooms are fully decorated and carpeted to make the patients feel more at home. The patients may do basket making, sewing, knitting, play dominoes or just sit and talk. In the summer the patients can sit out on the verandah. They say it is just like being at home. For a day in the life of a patient see next page.
